comments.body: I am curious why we are embedding this rather than using https://github.com/go-logr/zapr ?
There are some small differences configuring zap, e.g. EncoderConfig. As codebase was small we decided that it will be easier and faster to first develop it in k/k and propose changes to zapr later.
Why use zap Level? I don't think we should map Logr levels to zap levels.

We should set zap level in infologger, followed `l.l.Core().Enabled(lvl)` and  [l.l.Check(l.lvl, msg)](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/287aacb39d8d097791eb1d632b24a2389b14f028/staging/src/k8s.io/component-base/logs/json/json.go#L56) need  zap level.
